overview: A program to learn about the works, words, and ideas of Taro Okamoto while enjoying the "fictional history" of TAROMAN, which was produced under the day of broadcasting in 1972. How was TAROMAN born? What message did he convey in other programs in which he made a series of guest appearances as his popularity grew? What influence did he have on later creators? The full version of the theme song "Explosion! Taro Man" was also performed for the first time. The navigator is Arata Iura, who loves Taro Okamoto.
title: Taroman Historia
